channel.title: Need Help with some things
channel.description:
1st i want to know how do i change the lvl thing from 99 to 135
2nd i want to know how to add the thin when you hit door it grows like attack and hitpoints to 135 and how to make the hay grow strenth and the dummys grow defense or what ever
3td and how to add the code ::prayer to make it so you get bones so your grow your prayer to grow lvls so the max lvl will be 253

item.title: Need Help with some things
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“nemoigescape, post:5, topic:280743”]no offence but why would you want it so people click items for levels that is kinda rubbish

but here is the one for hay bales

case 299:
if(GoodDistance2(absX, absY, objectX, objectY, 3)) {
if(actionTimer == 0)
{
sendMessage(“WHAT ARE YOU A HORSE?”);
addSkillXP((0*playerLevel[1]), 1);
actionTimer = 1;
setAnimation(0x320);
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
}
break;

obviously i edited mine so people couldnt use it to gain levels lol[/quote]
You could have just deleted it.

Read full topic

item.title: Need Help with some things
item.dc:creator: @nemoigescape nemoigescape
item.description:
@nemoigescape wrote:

no offence but why would you want it so people click items for levels that is kinda rubbish

but here is the one for hay bales

case 299:
if(GoodDistance2(absX, absY, objectX, objectY, 3)) {
if(actionTimer == 0)
{
sendMessage(“WHAT ARE YOU A HORSE?”);
addSkillXP((0*playerLevel[1]), 1);
actionTimer = 1;
setAnimation(0x320);
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
}
break;

obviously i edited mine so people couldnt use it to gain levels lol

Read full topic

Find -

Change both 99’s to 135’s.

Under packet 132, add -

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("prayer")) { addItem(#, #); }
